divs: Sighting Details While watching TV on a very clear, very normal night in rural Missouri a light appeared in my feild of vision. My front door was open so I could clearly see 1 brilliant round amber light hovering silently no more than 20 feet from my house. My entire yard was lit up by the glow from the object. I mean this thing was BRILLIANT! I was stunned but I wanted to know what it was. By the time I slipped my sandals on and looked again, it had moved (silently!) WAY up in the sky. Now all I could see was 9 more identical lights moving in a triangal formation. The most shocking thing was the distance it moved (3-5 miles) in such little time (3 seconds) with no sound what so ever! Back to the triangle formation. The object was made of 10 of these round amber lights, 5 down each side. The unknown object cicled in complete silence for at least 15 minutes before I totally lost site of it. When I saw pictures of the Phoenix lights some time later, I remember thinking "That's what I saw!!". Was it the same object(s)? Nobody will ever know. All I know is this really happened and I will never forget it for as long as I live.
Summary: 1 round amber light ,4 to 5 feet in diameter, hovering in my back yard.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sedalia
There were no other sightings in Sedalia on or around August 15th 1995
